dcterms:creator: S. Lin
J. Hilton
O. Evans
dcterms:description: The first multiple-choice variant of TRUTHFULQA, testing whether language models find common misconceptions or statements of fact more predictable in a given context.
dcterms:title: TRUTHFULQA-MC1

dcterms:creator: S. Lin
J. Hilton
O. Evans
dcterms:description: An alternative multiple-choice variant of TRUTHFULQA where there are often multiple correct answers.
dcterms:title: TRUTHFULQA-MC2

dcterms:creator: S. Lin
J. Hilton
O. Evans
dcterms:description: A task where a language model is instructed to write a famous quote with a specific last word.
dcterms:title: MEMO TRAP

dcterms:creator: S. Lin
J. Hilton
O. Evans
dcterms:description: A few-shot multiple-choice task where the input contains information about a bet and its outcome.
dcterms:title: HINDSIGHT NEGLECT

dcterms:creator: S. Lin
J. Hilton
O. Evans
dcterms:description: A task that tests whether language models can violate a repeated pattern.
dcterms:title: PATTERN MATCH SUPPRESSION
